DOC.brief_summary: A single-center prospective interventional trial . Patients implanted sutureless bioprosthetic aortic valve Karolinska University Hospital Stockholm , Sweden 2012 eligible . 4-dimensional volume-rendered compute tomography ( CT ) heart perform . The aim CT ass valve leaflet motion . Results CT examination , preoperative clinical characteristic , postoperative clinical data register . Data collect prospectively retrospectively . Informed consent obtain patient meet inclusion criterion initiation study-specific procedure .
DOC.brief_title: Valve Leaflet Motion Sutureless Bioprosthetic Aortic Valves
DOC.criteria: Implanted sutureless Perceval ( Sorin Group ) sutureless bioprosthetic aortic valve Karolinska University Hospital Stockholm , Sweden 2012 2016 Provide write informed consent Contraindication CT intravenous contrast injection
